phrases.original: User's face is not prominent enough
phrases.translated: User's face is not prominent enough

phrases.original: There are {QUANTITY} profile photos awaiting review:
phrases.translated: There are {QUANTITY} profile photos awaiting review:

phrases.original: One profile photo is awaiting review:
phrases.translated: One profile photo is awaiting review:

phrases.original: A reason for flagging is required.
phrases.translated: A reason for flagging is required.

phrases.original: No photos are awaiting review at this time.
phrases.translated: No photos are awaiting review at this time.

phrases.original: All photo reviews were processed successfully.
phrases.translated: All photo reviews were processed successfully.

phrases.original: Hi, {FIRST-NAME}. This message pertains to your account with the Invites App, a tool for evangelism created for disciples in the International Christian Churches.
phrases.translated: Hi, {FIRST-NAME}. This message pertains to your account with the Invites App, a tool for evangelism created for disciples in the International Christian Churches.

phrases.original: Your profile photo was flagged by {FLAGGED-BY-FIRST-NAME} {FLAGGED-BY-LAST-NAME} on {FLAGGED-ON-DATE}, for the following reason:
phrases.translated: Your profile photo was flagged by {FLAGGED-BY-FIRST-NAME} {FLAGGED-BY-LAST-NAME} on {FLAGGED-ON-DATE}, for the following reason:

phrases.original: Below is the photo, which you added to your profile on {FLAGGED-PHOTO-ADDED-ON-DATE}:
phrases.translated: Below is the photo, which you added to your profile on {FLAGGED-PHOTO-ADDED-ON-DATE}:

phrases.original: While we wait for your revised photo, your profile will temporarily show the following generic photo instead:
phrases.translated: While we wait for your revised photo, your profile will temporarily show the following generic photo instead:

phrases.original: You can revise your photo immediately, by visiting the following Web address:
phrases.translated: You can revise your photo immediately, by visiting the following Web address:

phrases.original: If you have any questions or feedback, please reach out to {FLAGGED-BY-FIRST-NAME} at your convenience.  Thank you for your patience!
phrases.translated: If you have any questions or feedback, please reach out to {FLAGGED-BY-FIRST-NAME} at your convenience.  Thank you for your patience!

phrases.original: Times shown above are in the {EVENT-TIMEZONE} time zone.
phrases.translated: Times shown above are in the {EVENT-TIMEZONE} time zone.
